comment.body:
I am only seeing the buttons in first screenshot and initial rule hides the "ask gemini" button. Following 2nd rule also hides the buttons below the "ask gemini" button.
```
drive.google.com##button[aria-label*="Gemini"]
drive.google.com##ul[aria-label*="gemini"]
```

Hiding button in navigation:
`drive.google.com##div[class]:has(> div[class]:only-child > div[class]:only-child > div[jscontroller]:only-child > div:only-child > span > button[aria-label*="Gemini"])`

Where to find the items on 2nd screenshot?

issue.title: www.flashfussball.de

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.flashfussball.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.flashfussball.de%2F) ### Comment > Just open this webpage with enabled adguard and with my enabled filters of adguard. I use not personal filters here, but without adguard I see cookie notification, I can agree or cancel and use this website normal, adguard blocks the text, but let not close cookie-notification and let not use this website normal. The good solution can be automatically cancel all cookies or accept only technical necessary cookies and close cookie-windows. And if that is impossible, better not block, as make website difficult usable. I hope, you can find any solution for this website. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/4tds3xnxfxq8cgc0oo0gkc00g4o4gk4dyfg19lzqxw.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with given config in Opera (on Windows though). Please try to manually update your filters. If that does not help, please right click on the element -> inspect element and post a screenshot, thank you.

Our cookie filter and Hungarian filter block the cookie domain for me.

Please disable not required filter lists (already included in other lists):
EasyList Germany

Also worth a shot to disable user filter and check.

@zloyden please also take a look, thank you.
